General.Name: TGS Dis Ticaret AS
General.Description: TGS Dis Ticaret Anonim Sirketi provides intermediary services to exporters and imposter companies in Turkey. TGS Dis Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

1.Name: Mr. Burak  Tanriverdi
1.Title: Vice Chairman and Financial & Admin. Affairs Coordinator

2.Name: Ms. Çagla  Polat
2.Title: Vice Chairman, Chairman of the Exec Board & Chairman of the Shareholder Relations Unit
